TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示類別的插入點，這些類別會針對用戶端應用程式處理的所有訊息，擴充 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用戶端物件的功能。

span.span: Represents the insertion point for classes that extend the functionality of Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client objects for all messages handled by a client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 用戶端物件的延伸模組是否或、 將方法呼叫轉換成傳出訊息，並將內送訊息轉換成物件使用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用戶端應用程式，以及將它們傳送至用戶端方法的結果。WCF client objects, whether an extension of or of , are used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client applications to convert method calls into outbound messages and convert incoming messages to objects and pass them to the results of client methods. 類別是一個擴充點，您可以在這個擴充點上加入會在所有作業之間攔截訊息以及擴充用戶端行為的擴充物件。The class is an extensibility point to which you can add extension objects that intercept messages and extend client behavior across all operations. 攔截物件可以處理特定合約中的所有訊息，只處理特定作業的訊息，執行自訂通道初始設定，以及實作其他的自訂用戶端應用程式行為。Interception objects can process all messages in a particular contract, process only messages for particular operations, perform custom channel initialization, and implement other custom client application behavior. 如需用戶端架構的概觀，請參閱 < [WCF 用戶端架構](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture.md)。For an overview of client architecture, see [WCF Client Architecture](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture.md). 如需有關用戶端程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 WCF 用戶端存取服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md)。For more information about client programming, see [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md). 如需有關自訂和如何執行這些的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充用戶端](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients.md)。For details about customizations and how to perform them, see [Extending Clients](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients.md). - 屬性會傳回服務初始化回呼作業的分派執行階段物件。The property returns the dispatch run-time object for service-initiated callback operations. - 屬性會接受自訂作業選取器物件以控制用戶端訊息的路由。The property accepts a custom operation selector object to control the routing of client messages. - 屬性可以用來加入通道初始設定式，以便檢查或修改用戶端通道。The property enables the addition of a channel initializer that can inspect or modify the client channel. - 屬性可以用來顯示視覺化提示，讓使用者能在開啟通道之前選取認證。The property can be used to display a visual prompt to enable a user to select credentials prior to opening the channel. - 屬性會取得 物件的集合，而您可以在這些物件中加入自訂訊息攔截器，以提供該作業之訊息的專屬功能。The property gets a collection of objects to which you can add custom message interceptors that provide functionality specific to the messages of that operation. - 屬性允許應用程式關閉一些自動定址標頭，以便直接控制定址。The property enables an application to turn off some automatic addressing headers to directly control addressing. - 屬性允許用戶端限制用戶端接受的錯誤訊息大小。The property enables the client to limit the size of fault messages that the client accepts. - 屬性會取得 物件的集合，而您可以在這些物件中針對所有經過用戶端之訊息加入自訂訊息攔截器。The property gets a collection of objects to which you can add custom message interceptors for all messages traveling through a client. - 屬性會傳回傳入了未預期訊息的作業。The property returns the operation to which unexpected messages are passed. - 屬性會通知系統是否要確認已實際瞭解標示為 `MustUnderstand` 的 SOAP 標頭。The property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood. - 屬性會設定在傳輸層之訊息的目的端值，以便支援媒介及其他案例。The property sets the value of the destination of the message at the transport level to support intermediaries and other scenarios. 此外，還有一些會擷取用戶端合約資訊的其他屬性：In addition, there are a number of other properties that retrieve the client contract information: - - - 如果用戶端是雙工用戶端，下列屬性還會擷取用戶端回呼 (Callback) 型別和執行階段：If the client is a duplex client, the following properties also retrieve the client callback type and runtime: - - ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中， 會將 加入至 屬性，以便將其插入用戶端執行階段中。In the following code example an inserts a into the client runtime by adding it to the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例將示範將端點行為載入至用戶端端點的組態檔。The following code example shows a configuration file that loads the endpoint behavior into the client endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

span.span: If the contract is a duplex contract, the dispatch behavior contains service-initiated operations; otherwise the dispatch behavior contains no operations.

value.span: 實作的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可加入自訂 物件，而這個物件可以在建立與用戶端相關聯的通道時檢查此通道、登錄通道上的事件，以及使用 使狀態與通道產生關聯。Use the property to add a custom object that can inspect the channel that is associated with a client on creation, register for events on the channel, and associate state with the channel by using .

[!code-csharp[IInteractiveChannelInitializer#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iinteractivechannelinitializer/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#10)] [!code-vb[IInteractiveChannelInitializer#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/iinteractivechannelinitializer/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ManualAddressing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ManualAddressing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出用戶端是否將定址標頭加入至要求-回覆訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client adds addressing headers to request-reply messages.

value.span: 如果用戶端不會加入任何定址標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the client does not add any addressing headers; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不要讓用戶端將訊息識別碼 (Message ID) 和回覆 (Reply-To) 等定址標頭加入至要求/回覆訊息，以便應用程式可以控制這些標頭，請將 屬性設定為 `true`。Set the property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and Reply-To addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers. > [!NOTE] > 如果 為 `true`，用戶端就不支援在雙工通道上進行要求-回覆作業。If is `true`, the client does not support request-reply operations over a duplex channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可限制用戶端執行階段接受的錯誤訊息大小。Use the property to limit the size of fault messages accepted by the client runtime.

summary.span: 取得用戶端之用戶端作業的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of client operations for a client.

value.span: 物件的已同步處理集合。

span.span: A synchronized collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可取得這個用戶端的所有用戶端作業集合，而您可以使用這些作業來附加負責檢查或修改範圍限定於特定作業之訊息及行為的擴充物件。Use the property to get a collection of all client operations for this client that you can use to attach extension objects that inspect or modify messages and behavior scoped to a particular operation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中， 會將 加入至 屬性中的每一個 ，以便將其插入用戶端執行階段中。In the following code example an inserts a into the client runtime by adding it to each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IClientOperationSelector ^ OperationSelector { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IClientOperationSelector ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IClientOperationSelector ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 實作，這個實作可以用來選取 。

span.span: Gets or sets an implementation that can be used to select a .

value.span: 物件，此物件會選取 。

span.span: An object that selects a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可在用戶端叫用特定方法時修改作業的選取。Use the property to modify the selection of an operation when a client invokes a particular method. 預設的演算法，即使用作業方法的 名稱做為索引鍵來尋找 集合中的 。The default algorithm is to use the name of the of the operation method as a key to find the in the collection. 如果找不到相符的 物件，就表示引動過程已分派給 屬性所傳回的 物件。If no matching object is found, the invocation is dispatched to the object returned from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnhandledClientOperation As ClientOperation

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得方法的用戶端作業，這些方法在 集合中沒有任何對應的 。

span.span: Gets the client operation for methods that do not have a corresponding in the collection.

value.span: ，表示當作業選取器找不到與訊息相符的作業時，目前訊息內容將路由到至其中的方法。

span.span: A that represents the method to which the current message contents are routed when the operation selector cannot find an operation that matches the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateMustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateMustUnderstand : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定系統或應用程式是否會強制執行 SOAP 標頭處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果系統要執行 SOAP 標頭 處理，則為 ，否則為 ，表示應用程式會執行這項處理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可關閉對抵達之訊息標頭的強制驗證。Use the property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers. 在正常的執行過程中，訊息標頭會與 屬性進行比較，以確認服務已明確地處理抵達的標頭。In normal execution, message headers are compared against the property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service. 將此屬性設定為 `false`，即可停用這項檢查。Set this to `false` to disable this checking. 如果是設定為 `false`，應用程式就必須檢查標示為 MustUnderstand="true" 的標頭，並在無法瞭解其中一或多個標頭時傳回錯誤。When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood. 當應用程式應該接受任何傳回的 SOAP 訊息 (例如，使用具型別或不具型別的訊息時) 以及執行自訂標頭處理時，這種設定會十分有用。This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any returned SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Via { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Via : Uri with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定透過用戶端傳送訊息時使用的傳輸位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the transport address that is used to send messages through the client.

value.span: ，這是傳輸的目的端位址。

span.span: A that is the destination address for the transport.

value.span: 預設值為用戶端的 值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當訊息的直接目的端不是用戶端的 時，可以設定 屬性來指定訊息的傳輸位址。Set the property to specify a transport address for messages when the immediate destination of messages is not the client's . 這樣您就可以指定 SOAP 媒介，並且處理用戶端的 屬性值為邏輯名稱的情況。This enables you to specify SOAP intermediaries and handle scenarios in which the value of the property of the client is a logical name. 它就是 根據組態檔所設定的值。It is this value that the sets from a configuration file.
